resources.string: All permissions are required for the program to work, we promise that we will not touch your personal data.
The file does not exist on the memory card, delete the data from the database?
There is no application to open the file
Try a simple and convenient application for recording calls - "Call Writer"
We found unaccounted files in the folder of records, add them to the lists?
The demo period is over, recording of conversations is not conducted

For the application to work you need to take all the permissions that you see now, we do not read and do not transfer your personal data. The phone records will be stored on the memory card in the AiRecords folder.
